website_summaries.verdict: There's no getting around the fact that this shake is a little heavy on the sugar, but it does provide balanced nutrition and amazing flavor that even the pickiest of palates can't resist.
pros: Pediatrician approved formula is clinically proven to boost growth and weight gain
Packed with protein, vitamins, and minerals to deliver complete nutrition
Mixes smooth with no lumps or grittiness
Non-GMO, gluten-free, kosher, halaal, and suitable for kids who are lactose intolerant
cons: We’d love to see less sugar in this formula

customer_reviews.title: Good taste but poor value for money
customer_reviews.text: The box is very small and contains only 8 servings per box thats $41 for just 24 servings not a good value for money...plus if you have more than one kid (i have two boys) who have been prescribed to drink it twice a day then imagine..plus it a no return item...Giving 3 stars for flavor and the smooth consistency it has when mix it in blender..kids definitely love its taste and its helpful with picky eaters.
customer_reviews.author: Gulshafaq

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: My baby likes it! And less bulky than the cans plus I used organic milk for more calories and it came out so smooth and tastes great. My baby has autism and hasn’t ate in 6 weeks no solid food at all.... she only drinks pediasure. Very fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Yesi Avila

customer_reviews.title: kids like it

customer_reviews.title: Helps with a picky eater.

customer_reviews.author: Kristal M.

customer_reviews.title: Not as rich
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to have a backup for my kiddos for when I run out of chocolate milk, when they aren’t eating much, or just a little treat. My son loves the pre-mixed chocolate drinks but they are a little pricey in my opinion. I loved that the cost of 3 cans was reasonable. However; it was not as chocolatey as the pre-mixed drinks. I added 2 scoops and my son still was not super impressed with the flavor. I haven’t quite figured out how many scoops would please his taste buds, but depending on that- the cost may not be better because I’m actually using more mix and going through it quicker. We’ll see.
customer_reviews.author: Jakki

customer_reviews.title: Good but can we have a reduced sugar product please???????
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my niece who is an extremely picky eater! She liked the flavor (did not like the vanilla) but I could not believe hearing her that it is too sweet. I couldn't imagine a kid saying that as all kids love sweets. So, now we have to live with diluting this a lot just to make it drinkable. We use it with milk and cereal in the morning most of the time.
